00001 #!/usr/bin/python
00002 ## \file runTests.py
00003 ## \brief Execute all the unit tests in TranSupport.
00004 ## \author Seth R. Johnson
00005 ## 
00006 ## Run each unit test inside the /bin/test/ folder
00007 ## 
00008 
00009 import sys, os, glob
00010 
00011 ##! Path name to the current director
00012 pathName = os.path.dirname(sys.argv[0])
00013 print "Looking for unit tests in <%s>" % pathName
00014 
00015 os.chdir(pathName)
00016 
00017 ##! All of the unit tests we might like to run
00018 testFiles = glob.glob('*/t*')
00019 
00020 #print "All eligible files: " + ",".join(testFiles)
00021 print "="*80
00022 
00023 for file in testFiles:
00024         if (os.access(file, os.X_OK)):
00025                 print "  Running test <%s>" % file
00026                 print "="*80
00027                 os.system(file);
00028                 print "="*80
